content: {"name": "St. Luke's Senior Community Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- On the First and second Wednesday they serve persons with the second name starting with A to M\n- On the Third  and Forth Wednesday they serve persons with the second name starting withN Z", "email": "", "url": "https://stlukesbronx.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "765 E 222 Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10467", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.885109, "longitude": -73.858994}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 882-3060", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Provide prepacked bags or boxes of food"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
